title: Can't View ISA 2 Marks
content:
Until yesterday, I could view my ISA 2 marks, but now only my ISA 1 and assignment marks are visible. With the internal mark signatures scheduled for tomorrow, Iâ€™m wondering if the ISA 2 marks are unavailable for everyone due to the script review process of ISA 2, or if itâ€™s an issue specific to me.

Btw 5th sem.

comments.body: Same issue here, for few subjects ISA2 marks are visible and for few only ISA1 and assignment
Maybe it's getting updated after re-evaluation because they need to get our signatures tomorrow. I wonder how they managed to correct everything so quickly.
Thats the best part they didn't !
For me it hasn't what about you

DBMS and SE are still missing 

ML, E1, E2 marks haven't changed

Same here
My section didn't get their DBMS Assignment marks also yet
Ah, I'm just hoping they don't pull a stuntðŸŒš
